title: Recent advances in the environmental application of graphene-based composites
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2302-2323
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00340C, Tutorial Review
Rongbo Hou, Weiyu Zhu, Yanxue Yue, Jiashuo Feng, Alhadi Ishag, Bo Zhang, Yubing Sun
Graphene-based composites have been widely applied in environmental remediation owing to their high removal capacity.
